title: Orc Butchery (1R265)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Sauron
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Response: If a companion is killed by a [Sauron] Orc, the Free Peoples player must discard 3 cards from the top of his draw deck for each card in the dead pile.
Lore:	For sport, Orcs hew cruelly at the bodies of those they slay.
Rarity:	R
